about:
Hi, I am Shubham Tambere. I am a Software Engineer with experience of more tha 5 years. I enjoys complex problem solving and learning new things! 
 I am Inquisitive and enjoy understanding how things work. 
 I am fascinated by tech and have keen interest in designing distributed systems. 
 Outside of work, I enjoy Star Gazing [bit of astronomy buff!] , chess and Cricket [obviously]
